ARABIC: وَقَالَ نُوحٌ رَّبِّ لَا تَذَرْ عَلَى ٱلْأَرْضِ مِنَ ٱلْكَٰفِرِينَ دَيَّارًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Nuh said, 'My Lord! do not leave a single one of the kafirun on earth!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Noah said: "O Lord, do not leave a single habitation of unbelievers on the earth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Noah said: “My Lord, do not leave out of these unbelievers even a single dweller on earth,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Noah said, "Lord, do not leave a single disbeliever on earth;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And prayed Nooh, “O my Lord! Do not leave any of the disbelievers dwelling in the land.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And Nuh said: "My Lord! Leave not one of the disbelievers on the earth Dayyar!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And Nuh said: My Lord! leave not upon the land any dweller from among the unbelievers:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And Noah said, 'My Lord, leave not upon the earth of the unbelievers even one.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And Noah said: My Lord! Leave not one of the disbelievers in the land.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Noah prayed, "O my Lord! Do not leave on earth a single one of those who deny the truth --
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And Nuh said: my Lord! leave not upon the earth of the infidels one inhabitant.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: And Noah said, ‘My Lord! ‘Do not leave on the earth any inhabitant from among the faithless.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And Noah, said: "O my Lord! Leave not of the Unbelievers, a single one on earth!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And Nuh (Noah) said: "My Lord! Leave not one of the disbelievers on the earth!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: And Noah (supplicated) saying: 'My Lord, do not leave a single unbeliever upon the earth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Noah said, “My Lord, do not leave of the unbelievers a single dweller on earth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And Noah said, "My Lord, do not leave upon the earth from among the disbelievers an inhabitant.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [71:26] And Noah said, ‘My Lord, do not leave from among the disbelievers a single dweller upon the earth (dayyār means ‘one who inhabits a dwelling [dār]’), in other words, not one.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And Noah said) after Allah told him that none of his people will believe in him, apart from those who had already believed: (My Lord!) my Lord! (Leave not one of the disbelievers in the land.
